thread.title: Linda Helena Forsberg
thread.title_full: Bravodriver.com recensione scritta da Linda Helena Forsberg

author: Linda Helena Forsberg
title: Linda Helena Forsberg
text: I would realy recomend this transfer! The driver was kind and helpfull and alltough our flight was dalayd he meet is with a sign in tje arriwal hall. We arr a family of five and got a 16-chair buss just to our fel. Perfect in all asspects!
